vlive.korean: 필연성이 없어. There's no necessity. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 허영생 편
[우연 or 필연?] 들어가볼까? [Serendipitous or inevitable?] Shall we go in? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 9화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.9)
vlive.english: [Serendipitous or inevitable?] Shall we go in?

vlive.korean: [제 2 조 필연법, 운명적 동거?!] [Article 2] [The law of necessity, a fateful cohabitation?!] View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [로맨스 특별법] 제 2조 - 필연법, 운명적 동거?!
vlive.english: [Article 2] [The law of necessity, a fateful cohabitation?!]

vlive.korean: 이거는 정말 피할 수 없는. 필연적인 것 같아요. Well, I think it's an inevitable situation. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -10- '이창섭의 힐링 토크 콘서트'
vlive.english: Well, I think it's an inevitable situation.

vlive.korean: 태어났으면 죽는다는 거 외에는 필연이라는 건 없다고 생각을 해요. I believe the only destiny in life is death. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 디렉터스컷 어워즈 시상식 스팟라이브
vlive.english: I believe the only destiny in life is death.

examples.korean: This is a necessary consequence of progress. 발음듣기 이것은 진행상의 필연적인 결과이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is a necessary consequence of progress. 발음

examples.korean: It was an inevitable consequence of the decision. 발음듣기 그것은 그 결정의 필연적인 결과였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was an inevitable consequence of the decision. 발음

examples.korean: Your education is bound to shape your world view. 발음듣기 당신이 받는 교육은 필연적으로 당신의 세계관을 형성하게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Your education is bound to shape your world view. 발음

examples.korean: the inevitability of death 발음듣기 죽음의 필연성 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
If power was an illusion, wasn't weakness necessarily one also? (Lois McMaster Bujold) 발음듣기 만일 권력이 환상이라면, 약함도 필연적으로 그러하지 않은가? (로이스 맥마스터 부욜, 명예명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If power was an illusion, wasn't weakness necessarily one also? (Lois McMaster Bujold) 발음
